verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
1.Hail thou star of ocean
portal of the sky
Every virgin mother

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
of the Lord most high.
Oh by Gabriel's ave,
utterd long ago,

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Eva's name reversing
establishing peace below.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
2.Break the captives fetters
light on blindness pour.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
All our ills expelling
Every bliss implore
Show thyself a mother,

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
offer him our sighs
who for us incarnate
did not thee despise.

verse.name: v8
verse.lines:
3.Virgin of all virgins
to thy shelter take us.
Gentle of the gentle,

verse.name: v9
verse.lines:
Chaste and gentle make us.
Still as on we journey,

verse.name: v10
verse.lines:
Help our weak enedeavour,
Till we and Jesus we rojoice for ever.

verse.name: v11
verse.lines:
4.Through the highest heaven,
To the almight three.

verse.name: v12
verse.lines:
Father son and spirit,
One same glory be.
